entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
